DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Efficacy Safety Abciximab , Anti-Platelet Therapy , Combination With Two Different Heparin Regimens Patients Undergoing Percutaneous Coronary Intervention .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial compare efficacy safety abciximab , anti-platelet therapy , combination two different heparin regimens patient undergo percutaneous coronary intervention . Patients randomly assign one three treatment group : abciximab/low-dose weight-adjusted heparin , abciximab/standard-dose weight-adjusted heparin , placebo/standard-dose weight-adjusted heparin . The primary outcome study include number death , myocardial infarction , repeat revascularizations within 6 month , number death , myocardial infarction , severe myocardial ischemia lead urgent repeat percutaneous coronary intervention urgent coronary artery bypass surgery within 30 day . Please see attached result . Abciximab bolus plus 12-hour infusion standard-dose weight-adjusted heparin ; Abciximab bolus plus 12-hour infusion low-dose weight-adjusted heparin ; Placebo bolus plus 12-hour infusion standard-dose weight-adjusted heparin
